thread.title: The End of a Giant Tax Break Creates Bargains in New York Condo Market

author: Josh Barbanel
title: The End of a Giant Tax Break Creates Bargains in New York Condo Market
text:
Time is running out on one of the biggest benefits in the new condo market in New York City: microscopic property taxes.
Buyers can still acquire glamorous and expensive condominiums and pay almost no property taxes for up to two decades or more in a dwindling number of new developmentsâ€”but the deals are disappearing.
Consider the four-bedroom...
